<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/address/api_key"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint allows you to get the API key for Google Places API. Learn more [here](https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/places/web-service).

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response. The order has been created successfully.","content":{"text/plain":{"schema":{"type":"string","description":"The API key for Google Places.","example":"AIzaSyC6ASDCKAAS3G1E2EjRKlzk8TvHziasds\""}}}},"400":{"description":"See message description."},"500":{"description":"see message description."}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
